description: CHA - common properties supported across audiometry exams

LevelUnits.description: Units for both specifying and returning sound levels

ToneRepetitionInterval.description: Rate tones are presented, in ms

UnresponsiveMax.description: Number of repeated presentations at either the MinimumOutputLevel or MaximumOutputLevel (or the min/max frequencies for the frequency exams) that will halt an exam and return a Threshold of NaN

UseSoftwareButton.description: If true, the exam will be controlled with a virtual software button

BypassCalibrationLimit.description: If true, the CHA ignores calibration-specified maximum output level
